info.description: Multi-tenant monitoring SaaS platform API for website health checks, SSL monitoring, and intelligent alerting.
info.title: V-Insight API

get.description: Get all notification channels for the current tenant

post.description: Create a new notification channel for alerts (webhook, Discord, or email)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific alert channel
get.summary: Get an alert channel by ID

put.description: Update an existing alert channel's configuration

delete.description: Delete an alert channel and remove it from associated alert rules

post.description: Send a test notification through the specified alert channel

get.description: Get all alert rules with their associated channels for the current tenant

post.description: Create a new alert rule with optional alert channels

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific alert rule including its channels
get.summary: Get an alert rule by ID

put.description: Update an existing alert rule's configuration and associated channels

delete.description: Delete an alert rule and its channel associations

post.description: Authenticate with email and password to receive a JWT token

200.description: Successfully logged in, returns JWT token
User information including id, email, and tenant_id

post.description: Register a new user account and create an associated tenant organization
post.summary: Register a new user and tenant

400.description: Invalid request or user already exists

get.description: Get comprehensive dashboard data including stats, recent checks, and open incidents
Get summary statistics for the dashboard including monitor counts, incidents, and uptime
Get a list of incidents filtered by status, monitor, and date range
Get detailed information about a specific incident including monitor and alert rule details

post.description: Mark an incident as resolved manually

get.description: Get all monitors for the current tenant

post.description: Create a new monitoring endpoint for a website or service

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific monitor

delete.description: Delete a monitor and its associated alert rules

get.description: Get the health check history for a specific monitor
Retrieve detailed metrics for a specific monitor including uptime, response times, and status codes

200.description: Monitor metrics including uptime, response time history, and status code distribution

get.description: Get SSL certificate information and expiration status for a monitor

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
